perspective.name: Simulation
perspective.description: The base perspective definition for simulation perspectives

command.label: Step Experiment
command.tooltip: Advance the experiment step by step

command.label: Step Back Experiment
command.tooltip: Make One step back in the simulation

command.label: Close Experiment
command.tooltip: Stops the current experiment and dispose of it.

command.label: Hide/Show Toolbar
command.tooltip: Toggle the main toolbar on and off

command.tooltip: Make One step back in the simulation

command.label: Step Experiment
command.tooltip: Advance the experiment step by step

command.label: Close Experiment
command.tooltip: Stops the currently opened experiment and closes its perspective
